title: Displaying other players ratings after a game

replies.body: Why not? Players sit there in game and abuse others and act like they are gods, yet if we could see their rating which should reflect all their stats, they may start to shut up.
I see what u mean, in that case maybe the client should display info like KDA figure and such

The game shows everything BUT your scorecard and MMR info. What is Rito scared of?

I can only see it as a positive, you get ranked based on what Rito wants to rank you on, therefore if you are playing anything outside what they think is best, and your scorecard shows a shit score, than there are only 2 things that can happen.

First is you have a fair few loses, therefore you are the one who is making your team lose.
Second is you get a fair few win, that means whatever you are doing, you are doing correct, even if it nets a shit scorecard.

They should also show your MMR, not just end game or in your profile, but everywhere so when you start a game you can see your teams relevant MMR, I know I have dodged a few games once I noticed what their MMR was after I checked on an external site.
